channel.title: Nlsloop on Daniel Padfield
channel.description: Recent content in Nlsloop on Daniel Padfield

item.title: Introducing nlsLoop
item.description: Introduction So you have data you want to fit to a non-linear modelâ€¦ This blog post assumes you have a non-linear model formulation you want to fit to non-linear data and are aware of the excellent nlme package by Pinheiro and Bates and their book that nicely explains how to use it. This would be my first port of call if you want to understand the simplicities and complexities of fitting non-linear models and mixed effect models in general.
